shortdesc.ph: Used to configure the format, size, and pixel buffer of the watermark image.

section.p: This structure is used to configure the format, dimensions, and pixel buffer data of the watermark image.

plentry.pd: The width of the watermark buffer, in pixels.
The width of the watermark image, in pixels.
The width of the watermark buffer.
The height of the watermark buffer, in pixels.
The height of the watermark image, in pixels.
The height of the watermark buffer.
The length of the buffer, in bytes.

Watermark buffer format.
WATERMARK_BUFFER_FORMAT_I420: I420 format.
WATERMARK_BUFFER_FORMAT_BGRA: BGRA format.
WATERMARK_BUFFER_FORMAT_NV21: NV21 format.
WATERMARK_BUFFER_FORMAT_RGBA: RGBA format.
The format of the watermark buffer. See .
The format of the watermark buffer. See for details. The default value is . Currently supported formats include: , , , and .
The buffer that stores the watermark image data. The buffer must match the specified format and dimensions, where the size should be width * height * bytesPerPixel.
Raw image data buffer. See NSData.
The data of the watermark buffer.
Specify the format of the watermark buffer as I420.
Specify the format of the watermark buffer as BGRA.
Specify the format of the watermark buffer as NV21.
Specifies the format of the watermark buffer as RGBA.
